title: client
body: the client makes me lose matches because i try to make rune pages or fix them on the select champion queue and it freezes it maked it seem like i "doged" 2  of my ranked games i just "doged" another one just now :/

replies.body: Are you using any third party programs like play.tv?  They've been known to cause issues and crashes like this during champion select.  Let me know if that's the case for you.  If not, let me know as well as what version of the client you're on.  Happy to help!

no im not using any third party programs and im using the new client but i try to fix some runes while in champion select to move around and it freezes and i cant put any points into masteries nor close the mastery page i tried the old client and it works fine but the new one keeps doing that most of the time so ijust play with any mastery and Thank you for the help :)
why wouldnt i? i mean thats why they are there no?
Please don't make rune pages while you're queued up, create them prior to queuing!
